attributes.action: Capital Punishment, Scattering of Ashes at Sea for Terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
Execute terrorists, and scatter their ashes at sea to prevent shrines to martyrdom.

We petition the government to pursue with all vigour the necessary legislative steps required to restore the death penalty. Also, to make available a supplementary sentence of 'Cremation and Unmarked Scattering of Ashes at Sea' to be used where a terrorist offence motivated by religious extremism has resulted in loss of innocent life.
